-- getGeneralQnaList 일반QnA 리스트 WITH qna_tree AS ( SELECT QNA_ID AS 'qnaId' /*QnAID*/ ,QNA_CL_CD AS 'qnaClCd' /*QnA구분코드*/ ,QUST_CL_CD AS 'qustClCd' /*질문유형코드*/ ,RLTD_WRTG_ID AS 'rltdWrtgId' /*댓글ID*/ ,TITL_NM AS 'titlNm' /*제목*/ ,SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ ,RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ ,KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ ,ATTC_FILE_ID AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ ,RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ ,RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ ,DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ ,FRST_RGST_DT AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ ,convert(varchar(255), qna_id - 10000000000) sort1 ,convert(varchar(255), '') sort2 ,1 AS depth FROM IRIS_KNLD_QNA WHERE RLTD_WRTG_ID = 0 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
union all
SELECT QNA_ID AS 'qnaId' /*QnAID*/ ,QNA_CL_CD AS 'qnaClCd' /*QnA구분코드*/ ,QUST_CL_CD AS 'qustClCd' /*질문유형코드*/ ,RLTD_WRTG_ID AS 'rltdWrtgId' /*댓글ID*/ ,TITL_NM AS 'titlNm' /*제목*/ ,SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ ,RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ ,KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ ,ATTC_FILE_ID AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ ,RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ ,RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ ,DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ ,FRST_RGST_DT AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ ,sort1 ,convert(varchar(255), convert(nvarchar,tree.sort2) + ' > ' + convert(varchar(255), qna.qna_id + 10000000000)) sort2 ,tree.depth + 1 AS depth FROM IRIS_KNLD_QNA qna, qna_tree tree WHERE qna.RLTD_WRTG_ID = tree.qnaId AND qna.DEL_YN = 'N' ) SELECT qnaId AS 'qnaId' /*QnAID*/ ,qnaClCd AS 'qnaClCd' /*QnA구분코드*/ ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('QNA_CL_CD', qnaClCd) AS 'qnaClNm' /*QnA구분이름*/ ,qustClCd AS 'qustClCd' /*질문유형코드*/ ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('QUST_CL_CD', qustClCd) AS 'qustClNm' /*질문유형이름*/ ,rltdWrtgId AS 'rltdWrtgId' /*댓글ID*/ ,( CASE when (a.depth != 1 ) then '[RE] ' + titlNm + IIF ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IRIS_KNLD_QNA_REB WHERE QNA_ID = qnaId AND DEL_YN = 'N') > 0, '[' + convert(char,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IRIS_KNLD_QNA_REB WHERE QNA_ID = qnaId AND DEL_YN = 'N')) + ']', '' ) ELSE titlNm + IIF ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IRIS_KNLD_QNA_REB WHERE QNA_ID = qnaId AND DEL_YN = 'N') > 0, '[' + convert(nvarchar,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IRIS_KNLD_QNA_REB WHERE QNA_ID = qnaId AND DEL_YN = 'N')) + ']', '' ) END ) AS 'titlNm' /*제목[댓글수]*/ ,sbcNm AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ ,rtrvCnt AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ ,keywordNm AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ ,(CASE WHEN (select count(1) from IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL where ATTC_FIL_ID = attcFilId and DEL_YN = 'N') = 0 THEN NULL ELSE attcFilId END) AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ ,rgstId AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ ,dbo.fn_getUserName(rgstId) AS 'rgstNm' /*등록자*/ ,rgstOpsId AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ ,(SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM IRIS_SSO_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = rgstOpsId) AS 'rgstOpsNm' /*등록자부서이름*/ ,delYn AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ ,convert(varchar(10), frstRgstDt, 120) AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ ,depth FROM qna_tree a WHERE 1=1
AND titlNm like '%${titlNm}%'
AND dbo.fn_getUserName(rgstId) like '%${rgstNm}%'
AND qustClCd = '${qustClCd}'
AND frstRgstDt >= #{strtDt}
AND convert(varchar(10), frstRgstDt, 120) <= #{fnhDt}
ORDER BY sort1, sort2

-- getGeneralQnaInfo 일반QnA 상세화면 SELECT QNA_ID AS 'qnaId' /*QnAID*/ ,QNA_CL_CD AS 'qnaClCd' /*QnA구분코드*/ ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('QNA_CL_CD', A.QNA_CL_CD) AS 'qnaClNm' /*QnA구분이름*/ ,QUST_CL_CD AS 'qustClCd' /*질문유형코드*/ ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('QUST_CL_CD', A.QUST_CL_CD) AS 'qustClNm' /*질문유형이름*/ ,TITL_NM AS 'titlNm' /*제목[댓글수]*/ ,RLTD_WRTG_ID AS 'rltdWrtgId' /*관련글ID*/ ,SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ ,RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ ,KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ ,ATTC_FILE_ID AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ ,RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ ,dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) AS 'rgstNm' /*등록자*/ ,RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ ,(SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM IRIS_SSO_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.RGST_OPS_ID) AS 'rgstOpsNm' /*등록자부서이름*/ ,DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ ,convert(varchar(20),A.FRST_RGST_DT,23) AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ FROM IRIS_KNLD_QNA A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND QNA_ID = #{qnaId}
